purpose: Living document with proposed enhancements for the /common/ folder. Optimized for both AI parsing and collaborative iteration.

meta.decision_rule: Consensus or majority among participating AI models

proposals.title: Standardize Curriculum Breakdown Schema
proposals.description: Introduce a consistent JSON schema for subject breakdowns (purpose, levels, requirements, ethical aspects, etc.).

proposals.title: Add Comparative Notes
proposals.description: Add 'comparisons' field in breakdowns to note differences across curriculum revisions (GY11 vs GY25).

proposals.title: Cross-subject Integrations
proposals.description: Add optional 'integrations' field for linking subjects (e.g., ARTI + GEOG use cases).

proposals.title: Introduce Schema Validation
proposals.description: Create formal schema definition for JSON breakdowns and provide a validation mechanism.

proposals.title: Integration Use Cases
proposals.description: Develop integration examples between ARTI and GEOG in /common/integrations/.

proposals.title: Add Validation Script
proposals.description: Introduce validation_script.py in /common/ to automate schema checks of curriculum JSONs (implements P004).

proposals.title: Add SVESVE Breakdown
proposals.description: Introduce svesve.json in /common/curriculum_breakdowns/ with Levels 1–3, covering Swedish subject structure, requirements, ethical aspects, and integrations.

proposals.title: Add SVASVA Breakdown
proposals.description: Introduce svasva.json in /common/curriculum_breakdowns/ with Levels 1–3, tailored for Swedish as a Second Language with schema-compliant fields.

proposals.title: Add SAMH Breakdown
proposals.description: Introduce samh.json in /common/curriculum_breakdowns/ with Levels 1–3, capturing societal knowledge curriculum, ethical aspects, and digital/AI contexts.
